ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Rebreather pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings from Grizer on Veeshan 8-10 months it seemed like 3k each was the price.  Kedge was still popular and Fishbone still went from 5k as well. Today on
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings from Grizer on Veeshan

8-10 months it seemed like 3k each was the price. Kedge was still popular
and Fishbone still went from 5k as well.

Today on Veeshan, before the quests but after expansion I was thankful
when I got 1500-1800 this summer. Since the quest was announced I have
gone back to asking for 2k and selling them to guilds that want more then 3
for 1800. Then again my tinkering is at 172, so I my failures are pretty
rare so those prices still make cash.

Like you I would be interested in hearing what people are selling them for.

Cheers - Gesler/Grizer


>i know many of you accross all the servers that have high tinkering skills
>have probably been propositioned to make rebreathers. especially now that
>they are part of the warrior FA quest.
>
>I'm just curious what a reasonable rate might be?
>i know it kinda depends on the server, but i have had people tell me to
>charge anywhere from 2k - 10k for EACH rebreather. While i don't mind a
>profit, i really would hate to be raping my customers, and at the same time
>I don't want to undercut everyone else. i tinker because its fun, not as a
>way to make cash.
>
-----
Greg Jones, WD5IVD Austin, Texas
wd5ivd@... http://www.tapr.org/~wd5ivd
